results.instruction: I need a simple pass-through circuit. It should take a 1-bit input signal and directly forward it to the output without any modification. Name this module `PassthroughBit`.
I need a simple pass-through circuit. It should take a 8-bit input signal and directly forward it to the output without any modification. Name this module `PassthroughByte`.
I need a simple pass-through circuit. It should take a 16-bit input signal and directly forward it to the output without any modification. Name this module `PassthroughHalfWord`.
I need a simple pass-through circuit. It should take a 32-bit input signal and directly forward it to the output without any modification. Name this module `PassthroughWord`.
I need a simple pass-through circuit. It should take a 64-bit input signal and directly forward it to the output without any modification. Name this module `PassthroughDoubleWord`.
